quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: King and Grinch
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, horton. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the Jim Carrey Grinch movie, what kind of hair was on the Grinch suit?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: yak

questions.question: At the start of the book The Sneeches, how were some Sneeches different from the others?

options.text: Some had belly stars, some didnt.
Some were blue, some were yellow.
Some could run quickly, others ran slowly.
Some lived in trees, some lived on the ground.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Some had belly stars, some didnt.

questions.question: Besides Horton Hears a Who, what was Horton the Elephants other book?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Horton Hatches the Egg

questions.question: What was Dr. Seusss real name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Theodor Seuss Geisel

questions.question: What actor plays Dougs coworker and best friend, Deacon Palmer on the hit television sitcom The King of Queens?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Victor Williams

questions.question: Everyone said Will you please go now to which Dr. Seuss character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marvin K. Mooney

questions.question: What sport did The King of Queens character Doug Heffernan play in high school?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Football

questions.question: The King of Queens is a spin-off from the hit television sitcom Everybody Loves Raymond.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: How did the Grinchs eyes change at the end of the Grinch cartoon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: red to blue

questions.question: What was the name of the little girl that the Grinch woke up when he was stealing the Christmas presents and decorations in How the Grinch Stole Christmas!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cindy Lou Who

questions.question: How many hats did Bartholomew Cubbins take off in the childrens book by Dr. Seuss?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 500

questions.question: What is the name of Carrie Heffermans deceased mother, who has never been seen on the hit television show  The King Of Queens?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sophia

questions.question: Was Leah Remini, who plays Carrie in The King of Queens, ever on the hit television show Saved By The Bell?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: What was/were the final word(s) of The Lorax when he left in the self-titled childrens book?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Unless

questions.question: What city do Doug and Carrie Heffernan live in on the show  The King of Queens ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New York

quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: Dreams and Field Of Dreams
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, field, rays. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the movie Field of Dreams, what is Ray Kinsellas answer to the question Is this Heaven?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No, its Iowa.

questions.question: In the film Field of Dreams, while taking a late night walk in Chisholm, Minnesota, Ray sees a cinema marquee displaying which movie title?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Godfather

questions.question: What is the name of Rays wife in the 1989 movie Field of Dreams?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Annie

questions.question: What color hats did Dr. Grahams wife like to wear in the movie Field of Dreams?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: blue

questions.question: Name Dr. Seusss first book which was written in 1937.

options.text: And to Think That I Saw It on Mulberry Street

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: And to Think That I Saw It on Mulberry Street

questions.question: In the movie Field of Dreams, what reason do the ghost ballplayers give for not letting Ty Cobb play with them?

options.text: None of us could stand the son-of-a-b**** when we were alive, so we told him to stick it.
He spiked me enough times when I was alive; he isnt getting any more chances.
He wasnt one of us; he would never understand.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of us could stand the son-of-a-b**** when we were alive, so we told him to stick it.

questions.question: What is the title of the Terence Mann book in Field of Dreams that caused young Ray to rebel against his father?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Boat Rocker

questions.question: What is the name of Rays father in the film Field of Dreams?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John

questions.question: What prop did Dr. Graham always carry in Field of Dreams?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: umbrella

questions.question: In the movie Field of Dreams, while looking for Terence Manns residence, Ray is told that the first door that doesnt have a ____ in the window is his.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: chicken

questions.question: At which major league ballpark do Ray and Terence attend a game in Field of Dreams?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fenway Park

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT one of the messages the voice gives to Ray Kinsella in the movie Filed of Dreams?

options.text: If you build it, he will come.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Do not sell this farm.

questions.question: Finish this line delivered by Ray Kinsella in the movie Field of Dreams: When primal forces of nature tell you to do something...

options.text: the wise thing is to take it on faith.
the prudent thing is not to quibble over details.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the prudent thing is not to quibble over details.

questions.question: What does Terence yell as he is kicking Ray out of his apartment in the film Field of Dreams?

options.text: Tune in, turn on, drop out

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peace, love, dope

questions.question: What is the first name of Moonlight Graham, a character in the movie Field of Dreams?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Archie

quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Dreams and Character
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, field, line. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This literary protagonist lives in a totalitarian state, where everybody is constantly watched by the dictator, Big Brother.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Winston Smith

questions.question: This fictional hero teaches his two children, Scout and Jem, that it’s a sin to kill a mockingbird, since the only thing mocking birds do is sing their hearts for people to enjoy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Atticus Finch

questions.question: This fictional hero is strongly dominated by his demanding Jewish mother. He says the words, ‘I am marked like a road map from head to toe with my repressions’.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alexander Portnoy

questions.question: This literary character wanted to remain forever young and retain his extraordinarily good looks.  As a result of this wish, his portrait begins to age instead of him and becomes horrid and ugly, reflecting the character’s increasing fall into depravity.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dorian Gray

questions.question: The rivalry between these fictional twin-brothers, born in the Salinas Valley in the Trask family, resembles the relationship of the biblical characters, Cain and Abel.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Caleb and Aron

questions.question: This literary character is the gamekeeper, who helps Constance Chatterley experience a sexual awakening.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oliver Mellors

questions.question: Shoeless Joe, a character from Field of Dreams, says that the voice Ray heard belonged to which one of these?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ray

questions.question: This teenage literary hero, living in 1950s New York, thinks that people around him are ‘phonies’. His dream is to be the person who keeps children from falling off a cliff.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Holden Caulfield

questions.question: How does Rays father answer the question Is there a Heaven? in the movie Field of Dreams?

options.text: Oh yeah, its the place where the sky is always blue.
Oh yeah, its the place where youre forever young.
Oh yeah, its the most special place in the world.
Oh yeah, its the place where dreams come true.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oh yeah, its the place where dreams come true.

questions.question: What is the last spoken line in the movie Field of Dreams?

options.text: People will come, Ray, people will most definitely come.
Hey Dad, wanna have a catch?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Id like that.

questions.question: This fictional character is a World War II flier, stationed on the island of Pianosa, in the Mediterranean. He thinks that everyone wants to kill him. He wants to go home, but he cannot get out of combat duty, because there is a ‘catch’.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Yossarian

questions.question: This fictional character created by Jack Kerouac embodies the values of the ‘Beat Generation’. He is liberated, hedonistic, intense and dazzlingly unpredictable. He constantly travels round the USA in search of joyful adventure.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dean Moriarty

questions.question: What position did Rays father play in Field of Dreams?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: catcher

questions.question: What does Karin choke on in the film Field of Dreams after she falls from the bleachers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: hot dog

questions.question: In Field of Dreams, what reason does Shoeless Joe give Ray for why he cant come into the corn?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Youre not invited.

quizzes.title: History Quiz: Movie and List
quizzes.description: Test your history knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering History, ranks, appearance. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Although he is sane, this rebellious, fun-loving literary character is a patient in a mental ward. He confronts the domineering Nurse, Ratched.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Randle McMurphy

questions.question: This quote, that comes in at #49 on the AFI list, is from what classic horror movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frankenstein

questions.question: Name the Clint Eastwood flick that contains the #6 quote on AFIs list.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sudden Impact

questions.question: This quote, ranked # 58 on AFIs list, is from what Oscar-winning movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Godfather 2

questions.question: This famous movie quote, ranked #67 on AFIs list of Top Film Quotes, is from what classic movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Casablanca

questions.question: This song, sung by a very famous blonde, comes in at #12 on the AFI list. What movie is it from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes

questions.question: In what 1934 film did Shirley Temple sing this song which won 69th position on the American Film Institute Top 100 Movie Songs list?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bright Eyes

questions.question: Quote # 54 on the AFI list of 100 memorable movie quotes comes from what 1992 Penny Marshall movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A League of Their Own

questions.question: Carly Simon was not shaken or stirred at all when she sang this hit that makes its appearance at 67 on the American Film Institute Top 100 Movie Songs list. Choose the movie it comes from.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Spy Who Loved Me

questions.question: This movie quote ranks # 92 on the AFI list of 100 memorable movie quotes. Name the movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Caddyshack

questions.question: What 1994 Robert Zemeckis film contains the #40 quote on AFIs list?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Forrest Gump

questions.question: This quote, ranked #9 on AFIs list, comes from what 1950 multi-Oscar winning movie, starring Bette Davis?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All About Eve

questions.question: This classic disco hit performed by the Bee Gees, #9 on the American Film Institute Top 100 Movie Songs list, is from what 1970s movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Saturday Night Fever

questions.question: Although this quote only comes in at #61 on AFIs list, it is one of the most oft-quoted lines in movie history. Name the movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scarface

questions.question: What 1980 spoof movie features quote #79 on AFIs list?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Airplane!

quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, cereal, cartoon. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

options.text: Cat On A Hot Tin Roof

questions.question: Which of the following was the mascot for Sugar Crisp, a cereal that came out in 1963?

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Peanuts and Strip
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, cartoon, schroeder. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The Peanuts characters played baseball frequently.  Who isnt matched with their usual position?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lucy - 1st base

questions.question: In the Peanuts comic strip, how much does Lucy charge for psychiatric help at her booth?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 5 cents

questions.question: In 2006, this legendary basketball player and his wife, Juanita, announced that they filed for
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Jordan

questions.question: In the Peanuts Lucy is infatuated with this character who constantly rebuffs her advances.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Schroeder

questions.question: What year did the original Rocky movie come out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1976

questions.question: What US space mission named the command module Charlie Brown and the lunar module Snoopy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Apollo 10

questions.question: Who does Linus wait for every year at Halloween in the Peanuts comic strip?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Great Pumpkin

questions.question: In the Peanuts comic strip, Schroeder plays a toy piano very well. Who is his favorite classical composer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ludwig van Beethoven

questions.question: Who is Charlie Brown in love with in the comic strip Peanuts?

options.text: Girl with the Big Blue Eyes

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Little Red-Haired Girl

questions.question: What is the name of Charlie Browns little sister in the Peanuts comic strip?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sally

questions.question: What was the name of the puppy farm in Peanuts where Charlie Brown got Snoopy, his pet beagle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Daisy Hill Puppy Farm

questions.question: In the Peanuts cartoon strip, who does Marcie call Sir?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peppermint Patty

questions.question: What famous person from WWI does Snoopy pretend to battle from the top of his dog house in the comic strip Peanuts?
